name: nfl-scores
description: A small Mac desktop app to keep track of current NFL scores.

scripts.build: rm -rf NFLScoreCenter-darwin-x64 && electron-packager . NFLScoreCenter --ignore='(/Users/akeaswaran/Documents/Apps/nfl-scores/README.md|/Users/akeaswaran/Documents/Apps/nfl-scores/LICENSE.md|img/img1.png|npm-debug.log|.DS_Store)' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.2 && cp Icon.icns NFLScoreCenter-darwin-x64/NFLScoreCenter.app/Contents/Resources/atom.icns && npm run package

author: Akshay Easwaran <akeaswaran@me.com> (http://akeaswaran.me/)
